subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pirates shortstop JACK WILSON was on the bench for four consecutive games last week, with some speculating that a lack of hustle on defense had landed him there. After a meeting with team officials, Wilson, right, a former All-Star, played Friday and had hits in his first two at-bats.
